content.text:
# 2025–26 Sacramento Kings season

The 2025–26 Sacramento Kings season is the 81st season for the franchise in the National Basketball Association (NBA), and 41st season in the city of Sacramento. On May 1, 2025, the Kings hired Doug Christie as their head coach.
Draft picks

The Kings entered the draft with only one second-round selection. The team had previously traded its own first-round pick to the Atlanta Hawks in 2022. During the first round, Sacramento traded a 2027 second-round pick (originally acquired from the San Antonio Spurs) to the Oklahoma City Thunder in exchange for the draft rights to Nique Clifford.
